description.displayText: Sunita was a wonderful nanny to our twin toddlers for a year. She was always punctual, and got right to work. A keen cook, the kids always had great food options, even though they are fussy. Sunita was proactive in setting up play dates, ensuring they were constantly learning and socializing and made us feel part of her extended family. We both work full time, and always came home to a clean apartment and happy kids. She was flexible with last minute schedules and a positive influence. She is a hard worker and I highly recommend her.
